reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater stylish and versatile, being able to dress it up or down, and appreciate its great quality, soft texture, and comfort that's not scratchy or itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not cheap looking. Pretty nice
items.body: I actually really loke it. The material is quite thick and sturdy, it's got a good, tight stretch. Had to steam the crap out of it to get the wrinkles out, but looked nice and classy after that. Says dry clean only, but steam worked for me. Not scratchy at all, soft. Neck isn't too wide open like most other asymmetric sweaters so you can stay warm and wear a shirt underneath without it showing Read more
items.author: e

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Sweater
items.body: This sweater is gorgeous. It is very unique and has a beautiful drape. I received so may compliments on it. I can see this at a high end store, the fabric is not cheap. One word of advise for my tall girls out there. I would say order a size up because the sweater is asymmetrical at the hem. Because of the batwing, when you lift your arms up to hug someone, the shorter side will go up to your ribcage. The sweater is quite voluminous so this could add more fabric bulk so use your best judgement here... ie- too much sweater fabric vs. potential sweater rise. Either way, not a deal breaker for me and I am ordering in another color. I got a medium in red. I'm 5'8" about 145 lbs and it fit great. The red is a vibrant cherry red. Very pretty and perfect for the holidays... Read more
items.author: make it pretty

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality & Comfort but Not For Me
items.body: A beautiful off-the-shoulder sweater that I had high hopes for, and while the quality is fantastic, I ultimately decided to return it. Here’s my take on it: Quality and Comfort: The sweater is made from a really nice, soft material that feels great against the skin. It has a good weight to it, making it perfect for cooler weather. The craftsmanship is excellent, with neat stitching and no loose threads—definitely a high-quality piece. Style: The off-the-shoulder design is lovely and trendy, offering a relaxed yet chic look. Unfortunately, I realized that this style just isn’t for me. While it looked good, I didn't feel entirely comfortable wearing it off the shoulder at my age, which is why I decided to return it. That said, if you love the off-the-shoulder look, this sweater would be a great addition to your wardrobe! Final Thoughts: Even though it wasn’t the right fit for my style, I can’t fault the sweater itself. If you're into off-the-shoulder designs, I think you'll love it. The quality and softness are top-notch, but it just didn’t work for me personally. Returning was an easy process, though, which I appreciated! Read more
items.author: Kris Green

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit, feel… fabulous
items.body: I have ordered a lot of clothes on Amazon. Always looking for the perfect sweater and a great material. This sweater is great for dress up or dress down and looks amazing. I am a medium and it is true to size. It does say handwash but I will probably wash in delicate and hang dry . It’s the perfect mid weight sweater . U can wear it so many ways and once again I love the feel. It will last !!! Read more
items.author: Colleen Johnson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish & Comfortable Batwing Sleeve Blouse
items.body: I purchased the size large and it fits beautifully. This blouse is made of soft and breathable material, perfect for Spring, Autumn, and Winter. The boat neck and batwing sleeves add a unique touch to the design. It's versatile and can be paired with jeans, skirts, leggings, and more. A great choice for various occasions - work, dating, or casual outings. This blouse has quickly become a favorite in my closet! Read more
items.author: CG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater!
items.body: This has got to be the weirdest looking sweater I've ever seen, but so cute once you put it on. For reference I'm 5'4, 140 lbs, with a large bust (34DDD) and the small fits perfect. Luckily it has a tag on the inside so you know where your head goes cause without it I wouldn't be able to tell...lol. It's very flattering on the body. There's plenty of room in the arms due to the bat wing design but it's still fitted around the waist to make you look slim. The bottom hem can be worn straight across or at an angle. I love that it can be worn with jeans or dress pants depending on the look your going for. Already ordering it in another color. Read more
items.author: Nicole P.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay sweater, but not complimentary to all body types
items.body: Sweater goes great with leggings and jeans. I do not like how when lift up one arm the side continues to ride up. Looks great visually, but not very practical or complimentary on certain body types. Read more
items.author: KC

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bright red. Not deep red as pictured.
items.body: Lovely but not true to color that shows up on screen. It shows as more of a deep red when what came was bright red. For that reason, I returned. Read more
items.author: Siennan

short_description:
Womens Dress Boat Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress Boat Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Nutmeg, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Navy Blue, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
